issue.title: Integral tie-back in AtlasPlugin.cpp seems wrong - causes control glitches

content.raw:
I have the diff below, but all I did was comment out the integral tie-back section.
If you added a bool to AtlasCommand you could globally enable/disable the integral tie-back in AtlasPlugin.cpp  (below is the diff for version 2.5.2)
diff AtlasPlugin.cpp AtlasPlugin.cpp.orig 
1386d1385
< 	/*
1398d1396
< 	*/
content.html: I have the diff below, but all I did was comment out the integral tie-back section. If you added a bool to AtlasCommand you could globally enable/disable the integral tie-back in AtlasPlugin.cpp (below is the diff for version 2.5.2) diff AtlasPlugin.cpp AtlasPlugin.cpp.orig 1386d1385 < / 1398d1396 < /
